charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TO RECEIVE A FIREARM NOT REGISTERED(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant, Jose Luis Arteaga, is hereby sentenced to the Bureau of Prisons for a period of 46 months on Count 1 to be followed by a term of Supervised Release for 3 years. $100 special assessment. $1000 fine. 6/14/2017, on revocation, supervised release revoked. Imprisonment for a term of 18 months to run concurrent to the term of imprisonment imposed in case 4:16-cr-046-BLW and case 1:11-cr-004-EJL. No term of supervised release to follow.
